attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
6 Music and Asian Network are an essential part of the BBC's character. They provide a rich cultural depth and diversity which wonderfully reflects modern Britain. 

It's absolutely understandable that budget cuts have to made. However, it would be a tragedy to lose two fantastic radio stations which are so loved by so many.

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of government. This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
